description:
Not every bike ride is encounter-free, so worry less and ride more with the Bike Universal Mount Bear Spray Holder. It lets you attach a cannister of bear spray securely to your bike frame to boost your confidence and protection on every ride.

  • Carbon-filled nylon makes a durable and light holder for your protection
  • Impact-resistant body to make sure it won’t smash when you crash
  • Included gear straps attach to most bikes and keep it in place
  • Fits standard 225g cannisters
  • Designed and made in Fernie, BC
name: Ghostrider Equipment Bike Universal Bear Spray Holder
